description.raw:
When python packages are needed for a homebrew jenkins build, it's easier to use the homebrew version of python since it includes pip. Also, the packages will be cleared with each new build.

As an example, sdformat uses the `psutil` package if available for memory leak testing. Testing with this branch shows that the `ElementMemoryLeak` test is now being run.

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/SdformatDefault/job/sdformat-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/16/testReport/(root)/
